title: Smart Billing: Subscriptions & Utilities

sections.title: Automated Payments
sections.content:
Paying bills manually is the past. Modern banking uses automation.

- **Direct Debit / Auto-pay**: The bank automatically pays your bills (electricity, rent) every month.
- **E-bill / Paperless**: Your invoice arrives in your app or email, not in your physical mailbox.
- **Scheduled Payment**: You decide the exact day and time for a transfer.
- **Subscription Manager**: A tool in the app to see all your monthly services (Netflix, Gym, Spotify).

sections.title: Auto-pay Notification Flow
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Bill Arrives Digitally] --> B[App Sends Notification]
    B --> C{Auto-pay Active?}
    C -- Yes --> D[Money Sent on Due Date]
    C -- No --> E[User Pays Manually]
    D --> F[Digital Receipt Saved]
```

sections.title: Grammar: Prepositions of Time (In, On, At)
sections.content:
Use these prepositions to talk about when bills are due.

- **At**: For exact times.
  - *The payment is **at** 9:00 AM.*
  - *Auto-pay starts **at** midnight.*
- **On**: For days and specific dates.
  - *I pay the rent **on** Monday.*
  - *The due date is **on** June 15th.*
- **In**: For months, years, or periods of time.
  - *The bill arrives **in** October.*
  - *I have a new contract **in** 2024.*

sections.title: Billing Vocabulary
sections.content:
- **Due Date**: The deadline for payment.
- **Overdue**: A payment that is late.
- **Statement**: A monthly summary of your payments.
- **Utilities**: Essential services like water, gas, and electricity.
